item.title: SOIL ACTIVATOR IMPROVES CROP YIELDS IN ORGANIC BANANA PRODUCTION
item.description:
SOIL ACTIVATOR IMPROVES CROP YIELDS IN ORGANIC BANANA PRODUCTION

Montreal, Quebec, Canada, January 18th, 2015 - Earth Alive Clean Technologies Inc. (CSE: EAC) ("Earth Alive" or the "Company") is pleased to report significant increases in banana crop yields by a factor of 100% to 200%, over the regional average, for producers using Soil ActivatorTM.

item.title: BioAmber is a Sustainable Chemicals Company Offering Choice, Naturally
item.description:
BioAmber is a Sustainable Chemicals Company Offering Choice, Naturally

BioAmber is a sustainable chemicals company. Its proprietary technology platform combines industrial biotechnology and chemical catalysis to convert renewable feedstock into chemicals for use in a wide variety of everyday products including plastics, resins, food additives and personal care products.

item.title: Asian Stock Futures Signal Retreat Amid Resumption of Oil Slump
item.description:
Asian Stock Futures Signal Retreat Amid Resumption of Oil Slump

Asian stocks were poised to succumb to the global retreat that has already claimed equities in Europe and the U.S., with oil lingering back below $30 a barrel and anxiety heightened ahead of Japanese and American central bank meetings later this week.

item.title: Apple of Market Discord
item.description:
Apple of Market Discord

Most of the rough sledding in the U.S. stock market this year has been attributed to the negative effects of "lower for longer" oil prices and the slowing of the Chinese economy.
